answers.answer: Are you getting enough to drink and eat? This happens to me if I haven't had anything in a while...
Yep I've been really good about it. I eat all throughout the day.  And plenty of fluids.
Please keep us updated. It could honestly be anything

Well I went into work today and had my blood pressure checked and it was high. So I called my drs office and left a message for the nurse. Never heard back and when I tried to call again they said the nurse and Dr had left for the day but my blood pressure had gone down at that point.
High Blood Pressure Watch Out For preeclampsia. Cut foods to high in salt. Might swell up a bit it's actually common while prego

It happend to me and I was told  there is this nerve you have that runs the lenghth of your spine being 20 weeks the baby is gaining more weight so sometime when baby moves they land on that nerve and it messes with your blood flow
I spoke with them today they said it was probably from my blood pressure being too high and I needed to keep an eye on it. All is good right now :) thank you ladies!

question: I am 20 weeks and I was walking around the block with my sister, because my Dr told me I needed to stay active. I had stopped to talk to a neighbor and I got dizzy and lost my vision. My stomach also got very hard when I was walking. I was fine once I sat down but I was not over heated or over doing it. I'm going to the er of I feel bad again and calling my Dr tomorrow regardless. But anyone have any ideas of what it was?
title: has this happened to you?
